title: Introduction
description: Join us as we kick of the day off with a few words from the organizers.

title: Building a City That Loves its Enemies
description: Practical theology is an academic discipline that examines and reflects on religious practices in order to understand the theology that is enacted in those practices. Theological theory and theological practices can be more fully aligned, changed, or improved.
speaker: jkeesmaat

subSessions.title: Q&A
subSessions.description: Following her talk, Jennifer will be hosting a Q&A session around what it means to love our enemies.
subSessions.speaker: jkeesmaat

title: Enemies
description: We’ve arranged for speakers from around the GTA to come and share a bit about what it means to love our enemies in our present context.
